title: League of legends community
body:
Since the public chat rooms have been disabled on the client, was wondering are there communities I could join (Other than this one :)

Just want to start playing with people over a comms and meet other players to enjoy the game with other than the random matchups.

replies.body: clash of clans yeah? best chats
You can still join the public chatrooms, you just have to know the magic works and type them out :3
Wat s dis publik chtrooom kode.
They're all still there. But if you don't know how to enter them now I doubt you were very regular before hand.
